definitions.definition: A state of long-standing mutual hostility.
definitions.example: You couldn't call it a feud exactly, but there had always been a chill between Phil Mickelson and Tiger Woods.

definitions.definition: A combination of kindred to avenge injuries or affronts, done or offered to any of their blood, on the offender and all his race.
An estate granted to a vassal by a feudal lord in exchange for service.
